Pardon me, I didn’t realize what’s in your eyes My arms are open wide But I can’t ever decide what I wanna do

I’m staring at the sky But I can’t tell which way my thoughts are traveling I try to listen to your words But I can’t feel my head and it’s unraveling

Sometimes I no longer know what it means To care about the things you want to do Everybody’s living or they’re dead And I’m still in my bed and I don’t have a clue

[Chorus] I won’t lie and tell you it’s alright I won’t lie and tell you it’s alright
